settings.headline: WE ARE A LONGEVITY BRAND.
settings.text: OUR PASSION IS TO FIND SOLUTIONS TO LIVE LONGER, HEALTHIER LIVES

settings.custom_liquid: ETERNA Makes The Benefits Of Aging Research Accessible To You.

settings.text_1: ETERNA leverages science and data to provide the best nutraceuticals, tests & knowledge to extend human lifespan
settings.text_2: Our formulas are free from toxic preservatives, additives, flavorings and sweeteners. We use organic, vegan and gluten-free ingredients where possible, and every product is cruelty-free.
settings.text_3: We believe in conscious consumption. Our ingredients are responsibly sourced from around the world. Our packaging is made of 95% infinitely recyclable glass or card. Weâ€™re working on the other 5%.
